alert.note: Alert for Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:15AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...An area of heavy rain capable of producing gusyt winds will impact portions of south central Litchfield County through 645 AM EDT... At 614 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of heavy rain capbale of producing gusty winds near Southbury, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oakville, Woodbury Center, Watertown, Woodbury, Bethlehem, Roxbury, Bridgewater, Minortown, Bethlehem Village, Kinneys Corners, Hotchkissville, Chimney Point, River Road Reserve, Pomeraug, Roxbury Station, North Woodbury, Gulls Hollow, Bridgwater Green, Still River and Mead Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
